text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
―Doriyaaaaaaaa～～～～！！！！ 
The princess is coming through～～～～！！！！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I did it～～～～! I did it again today, with grace, elegance, 
and bravery! It's a great victory!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Of course! It's because―!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ……My, my destiny! My future prince is with me!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
When two people connect with each other, a miracle always 
happens! That's the power of the "bond"!!
choice_data_list: Wow, that's a lot of confidence……
Wow, that's a lot of confidence……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yes! I'm sure of it! This is what I learned…… 
from Princess Fighter!
……It's good to be confident. It'd be best if she keeps it up―

―Hmph. Finally found you. It's you, isn't it? The 
self-proclaimed princess, the common girl who's been on a roll lately…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
!? It's not "self-proclaimed"!! 
Who are you!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
Fu… Couldn't you tell just by looking at the princess aura 
that's surrounding me? I am the real princess! The most 
powerful princess at a hundred billion princess levels!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Pffffft～ What's a hundred billion princess level! 
I'm a princess as well! 
A princess who found her prince……!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text: ……Prince? Don't tell me you mean the trainer here?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
…… A～hahaha! That plain look didn't make me notice it at all! 
Like a little minced meat mixed with cheap carrot 
croquettes!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
T… that's not true! My trainer is, let's see…… 
wagyu beef steak, sprinkled with caviar―
choice_data_list: Can we not talk about food…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
Hmph… If you're so pissed, try shutting me up with a race. 
I'll have you personally shredded by a true princess!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Bring it on! I gonna beat you up so bad, you're gonna take 
back what you said!

That Uma Musume looks familiar. She's a powerhouse who's 
made a name in the Twinkle Series……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry! I'm not going to let that mean person beat me. 
I will beat her until she goes home crying!
choice_data_list: At least think of a strategy……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Geez, don't worry about me! 
We don't need a strategy! Because…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
You and I have the power of our invincible "bond"! Please 
believe in me and wait for me here～!

…I should've stopped her. Kawakami Princess ran away with 
confidence…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yes～! I'm on a good pace～! 
I'm going to take the lead with this speed～!

Kawakami Princess is running fast as ever, but…. 
the Ringlet Hair Uma Musume was chasing her from behind.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
Hmph…… You said your name was Kawakami right? 
What do you think it means to be a princess?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
!? It's obvious! 
A princess is a gorgeous, graceful, brave…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
…Fufufu, Fuhahahahaha! That's so funny! 
Hey you, listen carefully!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
―Being a princess means to posess a power that suppresses 
anyone below her! 
That's what a real princess is!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text: Ah-hahahahaha――I'll take the lead here!

Kawakami Princess tried hard to catch up to her, but in the end 
she lost by three horse lengths…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Ha… ha……… ugh, why ～……!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
Ah-hahahaha! Aargh *cough *cough ehem! 
This is the difference between a…… true princess and a 
fake one……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
―Uwaaaaaaaaa～～～～! ! 
It's so frustrating～～～～！！！！
Kawakami Princess screamed and ran away.
